Mengenal Suryo Utomo, Dirjen Pajak Baru Pilihan Sri Mulyani
02 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Desi Yolanda Tarigan
Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati memilih Suryo Utomo menjadi Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru. Suryo Utomo menggantikan Robert Pakpahan yang masuk masa pensiun.Seperti apa profil Suryo Utomo? Mari kenal lebih dekat lewat infografis berikut ini:


Foto: Tim Infografis/Denny Putra

Infographics
Getting to know Suryo Utomo, New Director General of Tax Options Sri Mulyani
02 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Desi Yolanda Tarigan
Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati chose Suryo Utomo to be the new Tax Director General (Dirjen). Suryo Utomo replaces Robert Pakpahan who is retired. What is Suryo Utomo's profile like? Let's get to know this through the following infographic:


Photo: Infographic Team / Denny Putra
